name: Roger Federer
description: Roger Federer is a Swiss former professional tennis player. He is considered by many to be the greatest tennis player of all time. Federer turned professional in 1998 and was continuously ranked in the top 10 from October 2002 to November 2016. Federer's achievements include 20 Grand Slam singles titles, 103 ATP singles titles, and a record eight Wimbledon men's singles titles. He spent a total of 310 weeks at the top of the ATP rankings, a record at the time of his retirement. Federer's rivalry with Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic, part of the Big Three, is renowned in the tennis world. Federer is known for his versatility across all playing surfaces, remarkable shot-making, and effortless playstyle.
